headline: Here’s Wedgewood Partners’ Investment Thesis for Zoetis (ZTS)
summary: Wedgewood Partners, an investment management company, released its second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the second quarter, Wedgewood Composite’s net return was 7.1% compared to the Standard & Poor’s 10.9%, the Russell 1000 Growth Index’s 17.8%, and the Russell 1000 Value Index’s 3.8% return for the same […]

headline: Veterinary Dermatology - Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Zoetis, Elanco, and Boehringer Ingelheim Dominate with Global Reach, Innovative Portfolios, and Strategic Expansion
summary: The Veterinary Dermatology Market Companies Quadrant offers a comprehensive analysis of the global veterinary dermatology market, highlighting key players, technological advancements, and emerging trends. With a projected growth from USD 20.11 billion in 2025 to USD 30.31 billion by 2030 at a CAGR of 8.5%, driven by increasing pet ownership and technological advances, the market faces challenges like high care costs and parasiticide resistance. Leading companies include Zoetis Inc., Elanco Anima
